sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import classes from './PlayerSection.module.css' class PlayerSection extends React.Component { state = { id: 1, data: '' } componentDidUpdate(prevProps, prevState, snapshot) { console.log(this.state.id) if(prevProps.currentId != this.state.id) { this.setState({id: this.props.currentId}) } console.log(this.state.id) } render() { return (
